data.actual_result: The overlap is very noticeable and you can see without zooming in on it.
data.expected_result: The mentions should slightly overlap as a thin line (like in 1.9.2), and not be easily noticeable.
data.short_description: Multiple mentions in a post (A user mention at the beginning followed by a channel mention at the end), cause the mentions to overlap.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find someone you would like to mention, do a mention, do a new line, and then tag a channel - Type the message and send it. - Obverse the sent messages
